price: (25) And Allāh invites to the Home of Peace [i.e., Paradise] and guides whom He wills to a straight path.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ دَارِ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ وَيَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yadʿū ilā dāri al-salāmi wayahdī man yashāu ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
